= What is googledrivesync_chrome ? =

To use Google Documents in offline mode with Google Drive and an environement where is not possible to have Google Chrome as default browser, you can't use double-click in Windows Explorer on file .gdoc and others.

"googledrivesync_chrome" is a Windows Script to open Chrome on a double-click of Google Doucments file in Google Drive directory.

= Details =

  * How to [install] googledrivesync_chrome.
  * Use json2.js library of Douglas Crockford from https://github.com/douglascrockford/JSON-js. Others details on JSON: http://www.json.org/js.html
